section.name: Core
section.p:
This topic covers the features and functionality that are typical for all library components. As any other tool Advanced GWT Components has a basic API that can be extended for custom purposes. To know how this APi works you will have to read topics listed below. If you are familiar with the library and / or experienced in widgets programming you can skip them.
Modeling Data
Using Widgets
Events Handling
Using Themes
Widgets Customization
